- Ceiling vent cover: rectangular metal grille with horizontal louvers. 
- Location: ceiling-mounted in interior space (likely HVAC supply/exhaust). 
- Fasteners: screws visible on two short sides; cover appears secure. 
- Condition: light dust on slats; minor edge discoloration near frame. 
- Surrounding surface: hairline crack in ceiling around vent; no staining or moisture evident.
